attributes.action: Make bankers peronally responsible for losses incurred through negligence and make it illegal for bonuses to be covered by professional insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many wealthy bankers have knowingly entered into deals that profit them individually while exposing their companies to unacceptable risk. Such action is a breach of trust and possibly negligent. A degree of personal as well as corporate liability should be retained.
